TopicTitle: Weather and active enviroments for planets.

Articles.Content:
I'm probably digging my own grave by suggesting something that'll kill my computer more than KSP already does. But oh, well. I think that weather should be implimented on appropriate planets like say, Laythe, Rain and cloud effects, those types of things. Or for active surfaces, Volcanoes or rivers of molten material on appropriate planets.

I may be resuggesting something, but my memory is a bit hazy. if this has been suggested already, feel free to delete/ignore/exclude from the rest of the reindeer games/exile this thread.
AFAIK that is all planned. Clouds in-game would automatically mean some kind of weather.
Cloud layer and occasional rain (like the one in Minecraft) would be ok, but with option to turn it off. Rain drains CPU resources like mad.

Both of these are on the 'What NOT to suggest list'

They have surely been noted by the devs will will probably be released in another update.
